GE07bhg4c11u:1: arjuna uvāca mad-anugrahāya paramaṃ guhyam adhyātma-saṃjñitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:2: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama ||1||
GE07bhg4c11u:6: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpam utkṣiptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:7: tad-didṛkṣuḥ pūrvoktam abhinandann arjuna uvāca mad-anugrahāyeti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:12: yat tvayoktaṃ vacaḥ aśocyān anvaśocas tvam ity ādi ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ yad vākyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:13: tena mamāyaṃ mohaḥ - ahaṃ hantā ete hanyante ity ādi lakṣaṇo bhramaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:16: madhusūdanaḥ : pūrvādhyāye nānā-vibhūtīr uktvā viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti viśvātmakaṃ pārameśvaraṃ rūpaṃ bhagavatābhihitaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:17: śrutvā paramotkaṇṭhitas tat-sākṣātkartum icchan pūrvoktam abhinandan mad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:19: niratiśaya-puruṣārtha-paryavasāyi guhyaṃ gopyaṃ yasmai kasmaicid vaktum anarham api |
GE07bhg4c11u:22_0: ādi-ṣaṣṭhādhyāya-paryantaṃ tv apadārtha-pradhānaṃ yat tvayā parama-kāruṇikena sarvajñenoktaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:22_1: vaco vākyaṃ tena vākyenāham eṣāṃ hantā mayaite hanyanta ity ādivividha-viparyāsa-lakṣaṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:27: pārtha ānandito darśayitvā svaṃ hariṇā punaḥ ||
GE07bhg4c11u:28: pūrvādhyāyānte viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti sarva-vibhūty-āśrayam ādi-puruṣaṃ sva-priya-sakhasyāṃśaṃ śrutvā
GE07bhg4c11u:31: adhyātmaṃ iti saptamy-arthe avyayībhāvād ātmanīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:32: ātmani yā yā saṃjñā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā sā saṃjātā yasya
GE07bhg4c11u:38: pūrvatra aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva-bhūtāśaya-sthitaḥ iti
GE07bhg4c11u:39: vibhūti-kathanopakrame viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam iti tad-upasaṃhāre ca
GE07bhg4c11u:40: nikhila-vibhūty-āśrayo mahat-sraṣṭā puruṣaḥ svasya kṛṣṇasyāvatāraḥ, sa tu mahat-sraṣṭādi-sarvāvatārīti tan-mukhāt pratītya
GE07bhg4c11u:41: sakhyānanda-sindhu-nimagno 'rjunas tat-puruṣa-rūpaṃ didṛkṣuḥ kṛṣṇoktam anuvadati mad iti
GE07bhg4c11u:42: mad-anugrahāyādhyātma-saṃjñitam vibhūti-viṣayakaṃ yad vacas tvayoktaṃ tena mama mohaḥ kathaṃ vidyām ity-ādy-ukto vigato naṣṭaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:43: adhyātmam ātmani paramātmani tvayi yā vibhūti-lakṣaṇā saṃjñā sā jātā |
GE07bhg4c11u:48: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā |
GE07bhg4c11u:54: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādau |
GE07bhg4c11u:56: kamalasya patre iva suprasanne viśāle akṣiṇī yasya tava he kamala-patrākṣa !
GE07bhg4c11u:62: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:64: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:68: kartety ādir madīyo moho vigata iti bhāvaḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c11u:70: tat-padārtha-nirṇaya-pradhānam api bhagavato vacanaṃ mayā śrutam ity āha bhavāpyayāv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:71: bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayāv utpatti-pralayau tvatta eva bhavantau tvatta eva vistaraśo mayā śrutau na tu saṃkṣepeṇāsakṛd ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:72: kamalasya patre iva dīrghe raktānte parama-manorame akṣiṇī yasya tava sa tvaṃ he kamala-patrākṣa ! atisaundaryātiśayollekho 'yaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:74: na kevalaṃ bhavāpyayau tvattaḥ śrutau mahātmanas tava bhāvo māhātmyam atiśayaiśvaryaṃ viśva-sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtve 'py avikāre tvaṃ śubhāśubha-karma-kārayitṛtve 'py avaiṣamyaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:76: sarvātmatvādi sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikam api cāvyayam akṣayaṃ mayā śrutam iti pariṇatam anuvartate ca-kārāt ||2||
GE07bhg4c11u:77: viśvanāthaḥ : asmin ṣaṭke tu bhavāpyayau sṛṣṭi-saṃhārau tvatta iti ahaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:78_0: kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ māhātmyaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtve
GE07bhg4c11u:78_1: 'py adhikārāsaṅgādi-lakṣaṇaṃ mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam iti na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti
GE07bhg4c11u:82: tvattas tvad-dhetukau bhūtānāṃ bhavāpyayau sarga-pralayau mayā tvattaḥ sakāśād vistaraśo 'sakṛt śrutau ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas
GE07bhg4c11u:83: tathā ity ādināvyayaṃ nityaṃ māhātmyam aiśvaryaṃ ca tava sarva-kartṛtve
GE07bhg4c11u:84: 'pi nirvikāratvaṃ sarva-niyantṛte 'py asaṅgatvam ity evam ādi tvatta eva
GE07bhg4c11u:85: mayā vistaraśaḥ śrutam mayā tatam idaṃ sarvam ity ādibhiḥ ||2||
GE07bhg4c11u:87: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara |
GE07bhg4c11u:88: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:89: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca evam etad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:90: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānām ity ādi mayā śrutam |
GE07bhg4c11u:91: yathā cedānīm ātmānaṃ tvam āttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat ity evaṃ kathayasi he parameśvara |
GE07bhg4c11u:95: tavaiśvarya-śakti-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannaṃ tad-rūpaṃ kautūhalād ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:96: madhusūdanaḥ : he parameśvara yathā yena prakāreṇa sopādhikena
GE07bhg4c11u:97: nirupādhikena ca niratiśaiśvaryeṇātmānaṃ tvam āttha kathayasi tvam evam etan nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:98: tvad-vacasi kutrāpi mamāviśvāsa-śaṅkā nāsty evety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:99: yadyapy evaṃ tathāpi kṛtārthī-bubhūṣayā draṣṭum icchāmi te tava rūpam aiśvaraṃ jñānaiśvarya-śakti-bala-vīrya-tejobhiḥ sampannam adbhutaṃ he
GE07bhg4c11u:101: sambodhanena tvad-vacasy aviśvāso mama nāsti didṛkṣā ca mahatī vartata iti sarvajñatvāt tvaṃ jānāsi sarvāntaryāmitvāc ceti sūcayati ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:102: viśvanāthaḥ : idānīm ātmānaṃ tvam yathāttha viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat iti, tac caivam eva mama nātra ko 'py aviśvāso
GE07bhg4c11u:104: kintu tad api saṃhṛtārtho bubhūṣayā tavaiśvaraṃ tad-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:105: draṣṭum icchāmi yenaikāṃśeneśvara-rūpeṇa tvaṃ jagat viṣṭabhya vartase |
GE07bhg4c11u:106: tasyaiva te rūpam aham idānīṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty arthaḥ ||3||
GE07bhg4c11u:107_0: baladevaḥ : evam iti viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ ity ādinā yathā tam ātmānaṃ svam āttha bravīṣi,
GE07bhg4c11u:107_1: tad etad evam eva na tava me saṃśaya-leśo 'pi tathāpi tavaiśvaraṃ sarva-praśāstṛ
GE07bhg4c11u:108: he parameśvara he puruṣottameti sambodhayan mama tad-didṛkṣāṃ jānāsy eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:114: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho |
GE07bhg4c11u:115: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:116: śrīdharaḥ : na cāhaṃ draṣṭum icchāmīty etāvataiva tvayā tad-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:121: mayārjunena tad-rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaktyam iti yadi manyase |
GE07bhg4c11u:122: tatas tarhi tad-rūpavantam ātmānam avyayaṃ nityaṃ mama darśaya ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:123: madhusūdanaḥ : draṣṭum ayogye kutas te didṛkṣety āsaṅkayāha manyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:125: he prabho sarva-svāmin ! tat tavaiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ mayārjunena draṣṭum śakyam iti yadi manyase jānāsīcchasi vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:127: aṇimādi-siddhi-śālināṃ yogānāṃ yoginām īśvara tatas tvad-icchā-vaśād eva me mahyam atyartham arthite tvaṃ parama-kāruṇiko darśaya
GE07bhg4c11u:129: viśvanāthaḥ : yogeśvareti ayogyasyāpi mama tad-darśana-yogyatāyāṃ tava yogaiśvaryam eva kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ ||4||
GE07bhg4c11u:130: baladevaḥ : aiśvarya-darśane bhagavan-saṃmatiṃ gṛhṇāti manyase yadīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:132: he prabho sarva-svāmin ! yogeśvareti sambodhayann ayogyasya me tvad-darśane tvac-chaktir eva hetur iti
GE07bhg4c11u:135: śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:137: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitaḥ sann atyadbhutaṃ rūpaṃ darśayiyan sāvadhāno bhavety evam arjunam abhimukhīkaroti śrī-bhagavān uvāca paśyeti caturbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:145: nānā aneke varṇā ākṛtayaś ca yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni ||5||
GE07bhg4c11u:146: madhusūdanaḥ : evam atyanta-bhaktenārjunena prārthitaḥ san śrī-bhagavān
GE07bhg4c11u:149: āvṛttyātyadbhuta-rūpāṇi darśayiṣyāmi tvaṃ sāvadhāno bhavety arjunam abhimukhīkaroti bhagavān
GE07bhg4c11u:150_0: śataśo 'tha sahasraśa ity aparimitāni tāni ca nānā-vidhāny aneka-prakārāṇi divyāny
GE07bhg4c11u:150_1: atyadbhutāni nānā vilakṣaṇā varṇā nīla-pīta-divya-prakārās tathākṛtayaś cāvayava-saṃsthāna-viśeṣā
GE07bhg4c11u:150_2: yeṣāṃ tāni nānā-varṇākṛtīni ca me mama rūpāṇi paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:153: viśvanāthaḥ : tataś ca svāṃśasya prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaḥ prathama-puruṣasya
GE07bhg4c11u:154: sahasra-śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt iti puruṣa-sūkta-proktaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:157: kāla-rūpatvam api jñāpayiṣyāmīti manasi vimṛṣyārjunaṃ prati sāvadhāno
GE07bhg4c11u:162: baladevaḥ : evam abhyarthito bhagavān prakṛty-antaryāmiṇaṃ sahasra-śirasaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:163: praśāstṛtva-pradhānaṃ devākāraṃ svāṃśaṃ pradarśayituṃ prakṛtopayogitvāt tatraiva kālātmakatāṃ ca bodhayitum arjunam avadhāpayatīty āha paśyeti
GE07bhg4c11u:168: bhāsamānasyaikasyaiva śatāni sahasrāṇi ca vibhūti-bhūtāni rūpāṇi paśya arhe loṭ tāni praṣṭum arho bhavety arthaḥ ||5||
GE07bhg4c11u:170: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:176: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi tvayā vānyena vā pūrvam adṛṣṭāni rūpāṇi |
GE07bhg4c11u:178: madhusūdanaḥ : divyāni rūpāṇi paśyety uktvā tāny eva leśato 'nukrāmati
GE07bhg4c11u:180: paśyādityān dvādaśa vasūn aṣṭau rudrān ekādaśa aśvinau dvau marutaḥ sapta-saptakān ekonapañcāśat
GE07bhg4c11u:182: bahūny anyāny adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇi pūrvam adṛṣṭāni manuṣya-loke tvayā tvatto 'nyena vā kenacit
GE07bhg4c11u:183: paśyāścaryāṇy adbhutāni he bhārata ! atra śataśo 'tha
GE07bhg4c11u:184: sahasraśaḥ nānā-vidhānīty asya vivaraṇaṃ bahūnīti ādityany ity ādi ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:185: adṛṣṭa-pūrvāṇīti divyānīty asya āścaryāṇīti nānā-varṇākṛtīnīty asyeti draṣṭavyam ||6||
GE07bhg4c11u:187: baladevaḥ : kiṃ cedha mama dehe ekastham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:189: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:193: pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchāmi tad api paśya ||6||
GE07bhg4c11u:196: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:199: varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ kṛtsnam api carācara-sahitaṃ jagad ihāsmin mama dehe 'vayava-rūpeṇaikatraiva svitamadyādhunaiva paśya |
GE07bhg4c11u:200: yac cānyaj jagad-āśraya-bhūtaṃ kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ jagataś cāvasthā-viśeṣādikaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:201: jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca yad apy anyad draṣṭum icchasi tat sarvaṃ paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:206: ekasminn evāvayava-rūpeṇa sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ samastaṃ sa-carācaram
GE07bhg4c11u:208: draṣṭum aśakyam adyādhunaiva paśya he guḍākeśa ! yac cānyaj jaya-parājayādikaṃ draṣṭum icchasi tad api sandehocchedāya paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:209: viśvanāthaḥ : paribhramatā tvayā varṣa-koṭibhir api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:211: iha prastāva ekasminn api mad-dehāvayave tiṣṭhaty ekastham |
GE07bhg4c11u:212: yac cānyat sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mamāsmin dehe
GE07bhg4c11u:214: baladevaḥ : kiṃ ceha mama dehe eka-stham eka-deśa-sthitaṃ sa-carācaraṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:216: yat tatra tatra paribhramatā tvayā varṣāyutair api draṣṭum aśakyaṃ tadaikadaivaikatraiva mad-anugrahād
GE07bhg4c11u:219: pradhāna-mahad-ādi-kāraṇa-svarūpaṃ sva-jaya-parājayādikaṃ cānyad draṣṭum icchasi tad api paśya ||7||
GE07bhg4c11u:221: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva sva-cakṣuṣā |
GE07bhg4c11u:222: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:223: śrīdharaḥ : yad uktam arjunena manyase yadi tac chakyam iti tatrāha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:224: anenaiva tu svīyena carma-cakṣuṣā māṃ draṣṭum na śakyase śakto na bhaviṣyasi |
GE07bhg4c11u:225: ato 'haṃ divyam alaukikaṃ jñānātmakaṃ cakṣus tubhyaṃ dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:226: mama aiśvaram asādhāraṇaṃ yogam yuktim aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyaṃ paśya ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:227: madhusūdanaḥ : yat tūktaṃ manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti
GE07bhg4c11u:228: viśeṣaṇam āha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:230: svabhāva-siddhena cakṣuṣā māṃ divya-rūpaṃ draṣṭum na tu śakyase na śaknoṣi
GE07bhg4c11u:232: śakyasa iti pāṭhe śakto na bhaviṣyasīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:233: sauvādikasyāpi śaknoter daivādikaḥ śyaṃś chāndas iti vā |
GE07bhg4c11u:235: tarhi tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ kathaṃ śaknuyām ata āha divyam aprākṛtaṃ mama
GE07bhg4c11u:236: divya-rūpa-darśana-kṣamaṃ dadāmi te tubhyaṃ cakṣus tena divyena cakṣuṣā paśya me yogam aghaṭana-ghaṭanā-sāmarthyātiśayam aiśvaram īśvarasya mamāsādharaṇam ||8||
GE07bhg4c11u:237_0: viśvanāthaḥ : indram indrajālaṃ māyā-mayaṃ vā rūpam ity arjuna mā manyatāṃ, kintu
GE07bhg4c11u:237_1: sac-cid-ānanda-mayam eva svarūpam antarbhūta-sarva-jagatkam atīndriyatvenaiva viśvasitum
GE07bhg4c11u:239: anenaiva prākṛtena sva-cakṣuṣā māṃ cid-ghanākāraṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyase na śaknoṣīty atas tubhyaṃ divyam aprākṛtaṃ cakṣur dadāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:240: tenaiva paśyete prākṛta-nara-māninam arjunaṃ kam api camatkāraṃ prāpayitum eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:241: yato hy arjuno bhagavat-pārṣada-mukhyatvān narāvatāratvāc ca prākṛta-nara
GE07bhg4c11u:243: kiṃ ca sākṣād-bhagavan-mādhuryam eva sa sva-cakṣuṣā sākṣād anubhavati so 'rjuno bhagavad-aṃśaṃ draṣṭuṃ tena aśaknuvan divyaṃ cakṣur gṛhṇīyād iti kaḥ khalu nyāyaḥ ? eke tv evam
GE07bhg4c11u:244: ācakṣate bhagavato nara-līlātva-mahāmādhuryaika-grāhi sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ yad bhavati |
GE07bhg4c11u:245: tac cakṣur ananya-bhakta iva bhagavato deva-līlātva-sampadaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:246: naiva gṛhṇāti na hi sitopala-rasāsvādinī rasanā khaṇḍaṃ guḍaṃ vā svādayituṃ śaknoti |
GE07bhg4c11u:248: deva-līlatvam aiśvaryaṃ jigrāhayiṣur bhagavān prema-rasān anukūlaṃ divyam amānuṣam eva cakṣur dadāv iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:251: baladevaḥ : manyase yadi tac chakyam ity arjuna-prārthitaṃ sampādayan
GE07bhg4c11u:252: nirataṃ, vismitaṃ kartuṃ tasmai sva-devākāra-grāhi divyaṃ cakṣur bhagavān
GE07bhg4c11u:253: dadāv ity āha na tu mām iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:258: yathāham ātmānam atipravāhākrāntaṃ vyanadmi tathā tvac-cakṣuś ceti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:259: tena mamaiśvaraṃ yogaṃ rūpaṃ paśya yujyate 'nena iti vyutpatter yogo rūpaṃ paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ity agrimāc ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:260: atra divyaṃ cakṣur eva dattaṃ na tu divyaṃ mano 'pīti bodhyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:263: sahasra-śiraso viśva-rūpasyādhikyam iti yad vadanti tat tv agre nirasyam
GE07bhg4c11u:265: saṃjaya uvāca evam uktvā tato rājan mahā-yogeśvaro hariḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:266: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram ||9||
GE07bhg4c11u:267: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvā bhagavān arjunāya svarūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:268: tac ca rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvārjunaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati sañjaya uvāca evam uktveti |
GE07bhg4c11u:270: mahān cāsau yogeśvaraś ca hariḥ paramam aiśvaraṃ rūpam darśitavān ||9||
GE07bhg4c11u:271: madhusūdanaḥ : bhagavān arjunāya divyaṃ rūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:272: sa ca tad dṛṣṭvā vismayāviṣṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmaṃ vṛttāntam evam uktvety ādibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ ślokair dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati saṃjaya uvāceti |
GE07bhg4c11u:273: evam na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anena cakṣuṣā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣur ity uktvā tato
GE07bhg4c11u:274: divya-cakṣuḥ-pradānād anantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra sthiro bhava
GE07bhg4c11u:276: mahān sarvotkṛṣṭaś cāsau yogeśvaraś ceti mahā-yogeśvaro harir bhaktānāṃ sarva-kleśāpahārī bhagavān darśanāyogyaṃ api darśayāmāsa
GE07bhg4c11u:279: baladevaḥ : evam uktvā hariḥ pārthāya viśva-rūpaṃ darśitavān |
GE07bhg4c11u:280: tac ca rūpaṃ vīkṣya pārtho harim evaṃ vijñāpitavān itīmam arthaṃ sañjayaḥ prāha evam ṣaḍbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:281: tato divya-cakṣur dānānantaraṃ he rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra !
GE07bhg4c11u:288: śrīdharaḥ : kathambhūtaṃ tad iti ? ata āha aneka-vaktra-nayanam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:289: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:292: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni yasmiṃs tat ||10||
GE07bhg4c11u:294: divyāni mālyāni ambarāṇi ca dhārayatīti tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:295: tathā divyo gandho yasya tādṛśaṃ anulepanaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:301: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ viśinaṣṭi aneketi |
GE07bhg4c11u:302: anekāni vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasmin rūpe |
GE07bhg4c11u:305: divyāny anekāny udyatāny āyudhāni astrāṇi yasmiṃs tat tathārūpam |
GE07bhg4c11u:307: ratnamayāni ca tathā divyāmbarāṇi vastrāṇi ca dhriyante yena tad-divya-mālyāmbara-dharaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:312: anantam aparicchinnaṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasmiṃs
GE07bhg4c11u:315: viśvanāthaḥ : viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya tat ||11||
GE07bhg4c11u:316: baladevaḥ : aneketi anekāni sahasrāṇi vaktrāṇi nayanāni ca yasya tad-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:319: viśvataś cakṣur uta viśvatomukhaḥ ity ādi-jñāpakāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:320: anekānām adbhutānāṃ darśanam yatra tat divyo gandho yatra tādṛg anulepanaṃ yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:321: devaṃ dyotamānam anantam apāraṃ viśvataḥ sarvato mukhāni yasya tat ||10-11||
GE07bhg4c11u:324: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ ||12||
GE07bhg4c11u:327: sūrya-sahasrasya yugapad utthitasya yadi yugapad utthitā bhāḥ prabhā bhavet tarhi sā tadā mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyā kathañcit sadṛśī syāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:330: madhusūdanaḥ : devam ity uktaṃ vivṛṇoti divīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:332_0: sahasrasyāparimita-sūrya-samūhasya yugapad uditasya yugapad utthitā bhāḥ prabhā yadi
GE07bhg4c11u:332_1: bhavet tadā sā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpasya bhāso dīpteḥ sadṛśī tulyā yadi syād yadi
GE07bhg4c11u:332_2: vā na syāt tato 'pi nūnaṃ viśvarūpasyaiva bhā
GE07bhg4c11u:336: ārūpeyam atiśayoktir utprekṣā vyañjayantī sarvathā nirupamatvam eva vyanakti ubhau yadi vyomni pṛthak-pravāhāv ity ādivat ||12||
GE07bhg4c11u:337: viśvanāthaḥ : ekadaiva yadi bhāḥ kāntir utthitā bhavet tadā tasya mahātmano viśvarūpa-puruṣasya bhāsaḥ prabhāyāḥ kānteḥ kathañcit sadṛśī bhavet ||12||
GE07bhg4c11u:339: divi ākāśe yugapad utthitasya sūrya-sahasrasya bhāḥ kāntiś ced yugapad utthitā bhavet tarhi sā tasya mahātmano viśva-rūpasya harer bhāsa ekasyāḥ kānteḥ sadṛśī syāt
GE07bhg4c11u:343: vyaṅgā satī sarvathā tat-kānter nairupamyaṃ vyañjayati |
GE07bhg4c11u:349: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyām āha saṃjayaḥ tatreti |
GE07bhg4c11u:350: anekadhā pravibhaktaṃ nānā-vibhāgenāvasthitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad devadevasya śarīre
GE07bhg4c11u:352: madhusūdanaḥ : ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sa-carācaram iti
GE07bhg4c11u:353: bhagavad-ājñaptam apy anubhūtavān arjuna ity āha tatraikastham iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:354: ekastham ekatra sthitaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā |
GE07bhg4c11u:355: deva-pitṛ-manuṣyādi-nānā-prakārair apaśyad devadevasya bhagavataḥ tatra viśvarūpe śarīre pāṇḍavo 'rjunas tadā viśvarūpāścarya-darśana-daśāyām
GE07bhg4c11u:356: viśvanāthaḥ : tatra tasmin yuddha-bhumāv eva devadevasya śarīre jagat brahmāṇḍaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarvam eva gaṇayitum aśakyam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:357: pravibhaktaṃ pṛthak pṛthaktayā sthitam ekastham ekadeśasthaṃ pratiromakūpasthaṃ pratikukṣisthaṃ vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:358: anekadhā mṛnmayaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ maṇimayaṃ vā pañcāśat-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ śata-koṭi-yojana-pramāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:360: baladevaḥ : tataḥ kim abhūd ity apekṣāyām āha tatreti |
GE07bhg4c11u:363: śrī-vigrahe kṛtsnaṃ nikhilaṃ jagad brahmāṇḍaṃ tadā pāṇḍavo 'paśyat |
GE07bhg4c11u:365: anekadheti mṛṇmayaṃ svarṇa-mayaṃ ratna-mayaṃ vā laghu-madhye bṛhad-bhūtaṃ vety arthaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c11u:369: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ kṛtavān iti ? tatrāha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:371: visamyenāviṣṭo vyāptaḥ san hṛṣṭāny utpulakitāni romāṇi yasya sa dhanañjayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:372: tam eva devaṃ śirasā praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:375: madhusūdanaḥ : evam adbhuta-darśane 'py arjuno na vibhayāṃcakāra nāpi netre saṃcacāra, nāpi saṃbhramāt kartavyaṃ visasmāra, nāpi tasmād deśād
GE07bhg4c11u:376: apasasāra, kintv atidhīratvāt tat-kālocitam eva vyavajahāra, mahati
GE07bhg4c11u:383: uttara-go-grahe ca sarvātrājño jitvā dhanam āhṛtavān iti
GE07bhg4c11u:384: prathita-mahā-parākramo 'tidhīraḥ sākṣād agnir iti vā mahā-tejasvitvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:385: devaṃ tam eva viśvarūpa-dharaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ śirasā bhūmi-lagnena praṇamya prakarṣeṇa bhakti-śraddhātiśayena natvā namaskṛtya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:389: sāttvika-romaharṣeṇa namaskāreṇāñjali-kareṇa ca vyabhicāriṇā cānubhāvākṣiptena vā dhṛti-mati-harṣa-vitarkādinā paripoṣāt sa-vāsanānāṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:390: śrotṝṇāṃ tādṛśaś citta-camatkāro 'pi tad-bhedānadhyavasāyāt paripoṣaṃ gataḥ paramānandāsvāda-rūpeṇādbhuta-raso bhavatīti sūcitam ||14||
GE07bhg4c11u:392: baladevaḥ : evaṃ kṛṣṇa-tattvavid arjunas tasmin sattvena jñātaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:393: sahasra-śīrṣatvam adhunā vīkṣyādbhutaṃ rasam anvabhūd ity āha tata iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:396: vismayenāviṣṭo hṛṣṭa-romā pulakito devaṃ śirasā bhū-lagnena praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ sann abhāṣata
GE07bhg4c11u:397: atra bhaya-netra-saṃvaraṇādikaṃ tasya nābhūt kintv adbhuto raso 'bhyudaid iti vyañjate
GE07bhg4c11u:398: iha tādṛśo harir ālambano muhur muhus tad-vīkṣaṇam uddīpanaṃ praṇati-pāṇi-yogāv anubhāvau, romāñcaḥ sāttvikas tair ākṣiptā matir dhṛti-harṣādayaḥ sañcāriṇaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:401: arjuna uvāca paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūta-viśeṣa-saṃghān |
GE07bhg4c11u:403: ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:405: he deva ! tava dehe devānām ādityādīn paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:406: tathā sarvān bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ saṃghān samūhān |
GE07bhg4c11u:407: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ kamalāsana-stham pṛthvī-padma-madhye
GE07bhg4c11u:409: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān |
GE07bhg4c11u:412: madhusūdanaḥ : yad bhagavatā darśitaṃ viśvarūpaṃ tad bhagavad-dattena
GE07bhg4c11u:413: divyena cakṣuṣā sarva-lokādṛśyam api paśyāmy aho mama bhāgya-prakarṣa iti svānubhavam āviṣkurvan arjuna uvāca paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:415: cākṣuṣa-jñāna-viṣayīkaromi he deva tava dehe viśvarūpe devān vasv-ādīn
GE07bhg4c11u:417: tathā bhūta-viśeṣāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca nānā-saṃsthānānāṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:419: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham īśam īśitāraṃ sarveṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:422: tathā ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān vaśiṣṭādīn brahma-putrān |
GE07bhg4c11u:423: uragāṃś ca divyān prākṛtān vāsuki-prabhṛtīn paśyāmīti sarvatrānvayaḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c11u:427: baladevaḥ : kim abhāṣata tad āha paśyāmīti saptadaśabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:430: brahmāṇam caturmukham kamalāsane caturmukhe sthitam tad-antaryāmiṇam īśam garbhodaka-śayam
GE07bhg4c11u:435: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa ||16||
GE07bhg4c11u:437: anekāni bāhv-ādīni yasya tādṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi
GE07bhg4c11u:438: | anantāni rūpāṇi yasya taṃ tvāṃ sarvataḥ paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:439: tava tvaṃ taṃ madhyamādiṃ ca na paśyāmi ||16||
GE07bhg4c11u:440: madhusūdanaḥ : yatra bhagavad-dehe sarvam idaṃ dṛṣṭavān, tam eva viśinaṣṭi
GE07bhg4c11u:442: bāhava udarāṇi vaktrāṇi netrāṇi cānekāni yasya tam
GE07bhg4c11u:444: tvā tvāṃ sarvataḥ sarvatrānantāni rūpāṇi yasyeti taṃ |
GE07bhg4c11u:445: tava tu punar nāntam avasānaṃ na madhyaṃ nāpy ādiṃ paśyāmi sarva-gatatvāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:449: baladevaḥ : yatra dehe devādīn dṛṣṭavāṃs taṃ viśinaṣṭi aneketi |
GE07bhg4c11u:452: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam |
GE07bhg4c11u:459: sarvato dīptimantam tejaḥ-puñja-rūpaṃ tathā durnirīkṣyaṃ draṣṭum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:461: dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutis tejo yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c11u:462: ataevāprameyam evaṃbhūta iti niścetum aśakyaṃ tvāṃ samantataḥ paśyāmi ||17||
GE07bhg4c11u:463: madhusūdanaḥ : tam eva viśvarūpaṃ bhagavantaṃ prakārānantaraṃ viśinaṣṭi
GE07bhg4c11u:467: ataeva durnirīkṣyaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā vinā nirīkṣitum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:470: | dīptayor analārkayor dyutir iva dyutir yasya tam aprameyam iti
GE07bhg4c11u:471: paricchettum aśakyaṃ samantāt sarvataḥ paśyāmi divyena cakṣuṣā |
GE07bhg4c11u:475: baladevaḥ : vidhāntareṇa tam eva viśinaṣṭi kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:476: durnirīkṣyam api tvām ahaṃ paśyāmi tat-prasādād divya-cakṣur-lābhāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:478: aprameyam idam ittham iti pramātum aśakyam
GE07bhg4c11u:480: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam |
GE07bhg4c11u:483: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tavātakaiśvaryaṃ tasmāt tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:492: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ tavātarkya-niratiśayiśvarya-darśanād anuminomi tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:493: tvam evākṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma veditavyaṃ mumukṣubhir
GE07bhg4c11u:495: tvam evāsya viśvasya paraṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ nidhīyate
GE07bhg4c11u:502: ataeva sanātanaś cirantanaḥ puruṣo yaḥ paramātmā sa eva tvaṃ me mato vidito 'si ||18||
GE07bhg4c11u:503: viśvanāthaḥ : veditavyaṃ muktair jñeyam yad akṣaraṃ brahma-tattvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:505: baladevaḥ : acintya-mahaiśvarya-vīkṣaṇāt tvam aham evaṃ niścinomīty āha tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:506: atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhigamyate, yat tad adṛśyam [MuṇḍU
GE07bhg4c11u:507: 1.5-6] ity ādi-vedānta-vākyair veditavyaṃ yat paramaṃ sa-śrīkam akṣaraṃ tattvam eva nidhānam āśrayo 'vyayas tvam avināśī śāśvata-dharma-goptā
GE07bhg4c11u:509: sa kāraṇaṃ kāraṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścij janitā na cādhipaḥ [ŚvetU 6.9] iti mantra-varṇoktaḥ sanātanaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣas tvam eva ||18||
GE07bhg4c11u:517: | ananta-vīryam anantaṃ vīryaṃ prabhāvo yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c11u:519: śaśi-sūryau netre yasya tādṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:520: tathā dīpto hutāśo 'gnir vaktreṣu yasya tam |
GE07bhg4c11u:523: ādir utpattir madhyaṃ sthitir anto vināśas
GE07bhg4c11u:529: dīpto hutāśo vaktraṃ yasya vaktreṣu yasyeti vā tam |
GE07bhg4c11u:530: svatejasā viśvaṃ idaṃ tapantam santāpayantaṃ tvā tvāṃ paśyāmi ||19||
GE07bhg4c11u:533: | yad uktaṃ prasāde vismaye harṣe dvi-trir-uktaṃ na duṣyati ||19||
GE07bhg4c11u:535: ādi-madhyāvasāna-śūnyam anantāni vīryāṇi tad-upalakṣaṇāni samagrāṇy aiśvaryāṇi ṣaṭ yasya tam ananta-bāhuṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:537: devādiṣu praṇateṣu prasanna-netraṃ tad-viparīteṣu asurādiṣu krūra-netram ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:539: arjunasya vākye kvacit punar-uktis tasya vismayāviṣṭatvān na doṣāya |
GE07bhg4c11u:540: yad uktaṃ prasāde vismaye harṣe dvi-trir-uktaṃ na duṣyati iti ||19||
GE07bhg4c11u:547: dyāv-āpṛthivyor idam antaram antarīkṣaṃ tvayaivaikena vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:551: tvadīyam idam ugraṃ ghoraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā loka-trayaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:554: madhusūdanaḥ : prakṛtasya bhagavad-rūpasya vyāptim āha dyāv-āpṛthivyor iti
GE07bhg4c11u:555: | dyāv-āpṛthivyor idam antaram antarīkṣaṃ hi tvayaivaikena vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:557: dṛṣṭvādbhutam atyanta-vismaya-karam idam ugraṃ duradhigamaṃ mahātejasvitvāt tava rūpam upalabhya loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam
GE07bhg4c11u:558: atyanta-bhītaṃ jātaṃ he mahātman sādhūnām abhaya-dāyaka |
GE07bhg4c11u:560: viśvanāthaḥ : atha prastopayogitvāt tasyaiva rūpasya kāla-rūpatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:562: baladevaḥ : atha tasyaiva rūpasya prakṛtyopayogitvena kāla-rūpatāṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:564: dyāv-āpṛthivyor antaram antarīkṣaṃ tathā sarvā diśaś caikena tvayā vyāptam |
GE07bhg4c11u:565: tavedam aparimitam adbhutam ugraṃ ca rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam bhītaṃ saṃcalanaṃ ca bhavati |
GE07bhg4c11u:566: he mahātman sarvāśraya ! atredam avagamyate tadā
GE07bhg4c11u:569: bhagavad-datta-divya-netrais tad-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na tv ekenaivārjunena svapateva svāpnika-rathādīni nijaiśvaryasya bahu-sākṣikatārtham etat
GE07bhg4c11u:571: amī hi tvā sura-saṃghā viśanti kecid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:575: amī sura-saṃghā bhītāḥ santas tvāṃ viśanti śaraṇaṃ praviśanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:576: teṣām madhye kecid atibhītā dūrata eva sthitvā
GE07bhg4c11u:577: kṛta-sampuṭa-kara-yugalāḥ santo gṛṇanti jaya jaya rakṣa rakṣeti
GE07bhg4c11u:580: madhusūdanaḥ : adhunā bhū-bhāra-saṃhara-kāritvam ātmanaḥ prakaṭayantaṃ bhagavantaṃ paśyann āha amīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:582: bhū-bhārāvatārārthaṃ manuṣya-rūpeṇāvatīrṇā yudhyamānāḥ santas tvā tvāṃ viśanti praviśanto dṛśyante |
GE07bhg4c11u:584: bhū-bhāra-bhūtā duryodhanādayas tvāṃ viśantīty api vaktavyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:585: evam ubhayor api senayoḥ kecid bhītāḥ palāyane 'py aśaktāḥ santaḥ prāñjalayo
GE07bhg4c11u:588: upalakṣya svasty astu sarvasya jagata ity uktvā maharṣi-siddha-saṅghā
GE07bhg4c11u:590: stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhir guṇotkarṣa-pratipādikābhir vāgbhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ paripūrṇārthābhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:592: baladevaḥ : amī sura-saṅghās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ viśanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:593: teṣu kecid bhītā dūrataḥ sthitvā prāñjalayaḥ santo gṛṇanti pāhi pāhi prabho asmān iti prārthayante
GE07bhg4c11u:594: mahatīṃ bhītim ālakṣya maharṣi-saṅghāḥ siddha-saṅghāś ca viśvasya svasty astu ity uktvā stuvanti
GE07bhg4c11u:596: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:608: smṛteś ca yāvad uṣṇaṃ bhaved annaṃ tāvad aśnanti vāgvatāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:609: tāvad aśnanti pitaro yāvan noktā havir guṇāḥ || iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:610: gandharvāś ca yakṣāś ca asurāś ca virocanādayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:612: sarva eva vismitāḥ santa tvāṃ vīkṣanta ity anvayaḥ ||22||
GE07bhg4c11u:614: rudrāś cādityāś ca vasavo ye ca sādhyā nāma deva-gaṇā viśve tulya-vibhaktika-viśvadeva-śabdābhyām
GE07bhg4c11u:615: deva-gaṇā aśvinau nāsatya-damrau maruta ekonapañcāśad-deva-gaṇā ūṣmapāś ca pitaro gandharvāṇāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ asurāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ ca saṃghāḥ samūhā vīkṣante
GE07bhg4c11u:616: paśyanti tvā tvāṃ tādṛśādbhuta-darśanāt te sarva eva vismitāś ca vismayam
GE07bhg4c11u:621: uṣmapāḥ pitaraḥ uṣmāṇaṃ pibanti iti nirukteḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:622: | uṣmabhāgā hi pitaraḥ iti śruteś ca ||22||
GE07bhg4c11u:629: he mahā-bāho mahad atyūrjitaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ sarve pravyathitā atibhītāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:632: bahūni vaktrāṇi netrāṇi ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:633: bahavo bāhava ūravaḥ pādāś ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:637: madhusūdanaḥ : loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam ity uktam upasaṃharati rūpam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:638: he mahā-bāho te tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ sarve 'pi prāṇinaḥ pravyathitās tathāhaṃ pravyathito bhayena |
GE07bhg4c11u:640: bahūni vaktrāṇi netrāṇi ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:641: bahavo bāhava ūravaḥ pādāś ca yasmiṃs tat |
GE07bhg4c11u:643: bahubhir daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālam atibhayānakaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva mat-sahitāḥ sarve lokā bhayena pīḍitā ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:645: baladevaḥ : loka-trayaṃ pravyathitam ity uktam upasaṃharati rūpaṃ mahad iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:653: dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo ||24||
GE07bhg4c11u:654: śrīdharaḥ : na kevalaṃ bhīto 'ham ity etāvad eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:657: nabhaḥ spṛśatīti nabhaḥ-spṛk tam antarīkṣa-vyāpinam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:662: evambhūtaṃ hi tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmā mano yasya so 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ dhairyam upaśamaṃ na labhe ||24||
GE07bhg4c11u:663: madhusūdanaḥ : bhayānakatvam eva prapañcayati nabha iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:664: na kevalaṃ pravyathita evāhaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā kintu pravyathito 'ntarātmā mano yasya so
GE07bhg4c11u:665: 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ dhairyaṃ dehendriyādi-dhāraṇa-sāmarthyaṃ śamaṃ ca manaḥ-prasādaṃ na vindāmi na labhe |
GE07bhg4c11u:670: dīpta-viśāla-netraṃ prajvalita-vistīrṇa-cakṣuṣaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmāhaṃ dhṛtiṃ śamaṃ ca na vvindāmīty anvayaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c11u:674: ahaṃ ca tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmā bhītodvigna-manāḥ san dhṛtim upaśamaṃ ca na vindāmi na labhe |
GE07bhg4c11u:683: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa ||25||
GE07bhg4c11u:685: he deveśa tava mukhāni dṛṣṭvā bhayāveśena diśo na jānāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:688: kīdṛśāni mukhāni dṛṣṭvā ? daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālāni kālānalaḥ vikṛtatvena pralayāgniḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:691: pralaya-kālānala-sadṛśāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvaiva na tu tāni prāpya bhaya-vaśena diśaḥ pūrvāparādi-vivekena na jāne |
GE07bhg4c11u:692: ato na labhe ca śarma sukhaṃ tvad-rūpa-darśane 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:693: ato he deveśa he jagannivāsa prasīda prasanno bhava māṃ prati |
GE07bhg4c11u:694: yathā bhavābhāvena tvad-darśanajaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnuyām iti śeṣaḥ ||25||
GE07bhg4c11u:700: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarve sahaivāvani-pāla-saṃghaiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:701: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūta-putras tathāsau sahāsmadīyair api yodha-mukhyaiḥ ||26||
GE07bhg4c11u:702: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni |
GE07bhg4c11u:703: kecid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ ||27||
GE07bhg4c11u:704: śrīdharaḥ : yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasīty anenāsmin saṅgrāme
GE07bhg4c11u:705: bhāvi-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mama dehe paśyeti yad bhagavatoktaṃ tad idānīṃ paśyann āha amī ceti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:707: avani-pālānāṃ jayadrathādīnāṃ rājñāṃ saṅghaiḥ samūhaiḥ sahaiva |
GE07bhg4c11u:709: tathā bhīṣmaś ca droṇaś cāsau sūta-putraḥ karṇaś ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:713_0: vakrāṇīti ye ete sarve tvaramāṇā dhāvantas tava daṃṣṭrābhiḥ karālāni vikṛtāni bhayṅkarāṇi
GE07bhg4c11u:713_1: vaktrāṇi viśanti teṣāṃ madhye kecic cūrṇīkṛtair uttamāṅgaiḥ śirobhir upalakṣitā danta-sandhiṣu
GE07bhg4c11u:714: madhusūdanaḥ : asmākaṃ jayaṃ pareṣāṃ parājayaṃ ca sarvadā draṣṭum iṣṭaṃ paśya mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasīti bhagavad-ādiṣṭam
GE07bhg4c11u:717: duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ śataṃ sodarā yuyutsuṃ vinā sarve tvāṃ tvaramāṇā viśantīty agretanenānvayaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:720: sahaivāvanipālānāṃ khalv ādīnāṃ rājñāṃ saṃghais tvāṃ viśanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:721_0: na kevalaṃ duryodhanādaya eva viśanti kintu ajayatvena sarvaiḥ sambhāvito 'pi bhīṣmo
GE07bhg4c11u:721_1: droṇaḥ sūta-putraḥ karṇas tathāsau sarvadā mama vidveṣṭā sahāsmadīyair api parakīyair
GE07bhg4c11u:723: amī dhṛtarāṣṭra-putra-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve 'pi te tava daṃṣṭrā-karālāni
GE07bhg4c11u:725: tatra ca kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ śirobhir viśiṣṭā daśanāntareṣu vilagnā viśeṣeṇa saṃlagnā dṛśyante mayā samyag asandehena ||27||
GE07bhg4c11u:727: baladevaḥ : yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi ity anenāsmin yuddhe
GE07bhg4c11u:728: bhaviṣyaj-jaya-parājayādikaṃ ca mad-dehe paśyeti yad bhagavatoktaṃ tad adhunā paśyann āha amī ceti pañcabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:729: amī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrā duryodhanādayaḥ sarve 'vanipāla-saṃghaiḥ śalya-jayadrathādi-bhūpa-vṛndaiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:730: saha tvaramāṇāḥ santas te vaktrāṇi viśantīty uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:734: na kevalaṃ ta eva kintv asmadīyā ye yodha-mukhyā
GE07bhg4c11u:735: dhṛṣṭadyumnādayaḥ taiḥ saheti te 'pi praviśantīti sahoktir alaṅkāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:736: kecid iti teṣāṃ madhye kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgair mastakaiḥ sahitā daśanāntareṣu danta-sandhiṣu vilagnāḥ saṃdṛśyante mayā ||26-27||
GE07bhg4c11u:740: tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti ||28||
GE07bhg4c11u:744: samudrābhimukhāḥ santo yathā samudram eva dravanti viśanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:745: tathāmī ye nara-loka-vīrās te viśanti tathaiva lokā ete janā api tava mukhāni
GE07bhg4c11u:747: madhusūdanaḥ : rājñāṃ bhagavan-mukha-praveśane nidarśanam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c11u:748_0: yathā nadīnām aneka-mārga-pravṛttānāṃ bahavo 'mbūnāṃ jalānāṃ vegāḥ vegavantaḥ pravāhāḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:748_1: samudrābhimukhāḥ santaḥ samudram eva dravanti viśanti tathā tavāmī nara-loka-vīrā
GE07bhg4c11u:748_2: viśanti vaktrāṇy abhitaḥ sarvato jvalanti abhivijvalantīti vā pāṭhaḥ ||28 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:750: baladevaḥ : praveśe dṛṣṭāntāv āha yatheti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:754: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṃgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddha-vegāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:755: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddha-vegāḥ ||29||
GE07bhg4c11u:756: śrīdharaḥ : avaśatvena praveśe nadī-vego dṛṣṭānta uktaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:758: pradīptaṃ jvalanam agniṃ pataṅgāḥ śalabhā buddhi-pūrvakaṃ samṛddho vego yeṣāṃ te yathā nāśāya
GE07bhg4c11u:759: maraṇāyaiva viśanti tathaiva lokā ete janā api tava mukhāni praviśanti
GE07bhg4c11u:760: madhusūdanaḥ : abuddhi-pūrvaka-praveśe nadī-vegaṃ dṛṣṭāntam uktvā buddhi-pūrvaka-praveśe dṛṣṭāntam āha yatheti |
GE07bhg4c11u:762: samṛddha-vegāḥ santo buddhi-pūrvaṃ pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ viśanti nāśāya maraṇāyaiva tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokā ete duryodhana-prabhṛtayaḥ sarve
GE07bhg4c11u:767: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:768: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo ||30||
GE07bhg4c11u:769: śrīdharaḥ : tataḥ samantāt kim ? ata āha lelihyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:776: kiṃ ca he viṣṇo tava bhāso dīptayas tejobhir visphūraṇaiḥ samagraṃ jagad vyāpya tīvrāḥ satyaḥ pratapanti santāpayanti ||30||
GE07bhg4c11u:777: madhusūdanaḥ : yoddhu-kāmānāṃ rājñāṃ bhagavan-mukha-praveśa-prakāram uktvā tadā bhagavatas tad-bhāsāṃ ca pravṛtti-prakāram āha lelihyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:778: evaṃ vegena praviśato lokān duryodhanādīn samagrān sarvān grasamāno 'ntaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:779_0: praveśayaj jvaladbhir vadanaiḥ samantāt sarvatas tvaṃ lelihyasa āsvādayasi tejobhir
GE07bhg4c11u:779_1: bhābhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ yasmāt tvaṃ bhābhir jagad āpūrayasi tasmāt tavogrās
GE07bhg4c11u:779_2: tīvrā bhāso dīptayaḥ prajvalato jvalanasyeva pratapanti santāpaṃ janayanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:782: baladevaḥ : yoddhṝṇāṃ tan-mukha-praveśe prakāram uktvā tasya tad-bhāsāṃ ca tatra pravṛtti-prakāram āha lelihyasa iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:783: vegena praviśataḥ samagrān lokān duryodhanādīn jvaladbhir vadanair grasamāno gilan samantād roṣāveśena lelihasye tad-rudhirokṣitam oṣṭhādikaṃ muhur muhur lekṣi |
GE07bhg4c11u:784: tavogrā bhāso dīptayo 'sahyais tejobhiḥ samagraṃ jagad āpūrya pratapanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:785: he viṣṇo ! viśva-vyāpin ! tvattaḥ palāyanaṃ durghaṭam ity arthaḥ ||30||
GE07bhg4c11u:789: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:791: bhavān ugra-rūpaḥ kaḥ ? ity ākhyāhi ākhyāhi kathaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:794: bhavantam ādyaṃ puruṣaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:795: yatas tava pravṛttim ceṣṭāṃ kim artham evaṃ pravṛtto 'sīti na jānāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:796: evaṃ bhūtasya tava pravṛttiṃ vārtām api na jānāmīti ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:798: evam ugra-rūpaḥ krūrākāraḥ ko bhavān ity ākhyāhi kathaya me mahyam atyantānugrāhyāya |
GE07bhg4c11u:799: ataeva namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarva-gurave he deva-vara prasīda prasādaṃ kraurya-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:801: vijñātum viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ sarva-kāraṇaṃ, na hi yasmāt tava sakhāpi san prajānāmi tava pravṛttim ceṣṭām ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:803: baladevaḥ : evaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ vyañjita-kāla-śaktiṃ bhagavantam upavarṇya tat-tattva-vid apy arjunaḥ sva-jñāna-dārḍhyāya pṛcchati ākhyāhīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:804: darśayātmānam avyayam iti sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ darśayitum arthitena bhagavatā tad-rūpaṃ pradarśya tasya punar atighorā saṃhartṛtā pradarśyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:805: tatrogra-rūpo bhavān ka ity ākhyāhi kathaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:809: ādyaṃ bhavantam ahaṃ viśeṣeṇa jñātum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:810: tava pravṛttiṃ ceṣṭāṃ ca na hi prajānāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:811: kim artham evaṃ pravṛtto 'sīti tat-prayojanaṃ cākhyāhīti ||31||
GE07bhg4c11u:813: śrī-bhagavān uvāca kālo 'smi loka-kṣaya-kṛt pravṛddho lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:814: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ ||32||
GE07bhg4c11u:815: śrīdharaḥ : evam prārthitaḥ san bhagavān uvāca kāla iti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:818: lokān prāṇinaḥ saṃhartum iha loke pravṛtto 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:819: ata ṛte 'pi tvāṃ hantāraṃ vināpi na bhaviṣyanti na
GE07bhg4c11u:821: yadyapi tvayā na hantavyā ete tathāpi mayā kālātmanā grastāḥ santo mariṣyanty eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:822: ke te ? pratyanīkeṣu anīkāni anīkāni prati |
GE07bhg4c11u:823: bhīṣma-droṇādīnāṃ sarvāsu senāsu ye yodhāro 'vasthitās te sarve 'pi ||32||
GE07bhg4c11u:824: madhusūdanaḥ : evam arjunena prārthito yaḥ svayaṃ yad-arthā ca
GE07bhg4c11u:825: sva-pravṛttis tat sarvaṃ tribhir ślokaiḥ kālo 'smīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:827: kriyā-śakty-upahitaḥ sarvasya saṃhartā parameśvaro 'smi bhavāmīdānīṃ pravṛddho vṛddhiṃ gataḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:828: yad-arthaṃ pravṛttas tac chṛṇu lokān samāhartum bhakṣayituṃ pravṛtto 'ham ihāsmin kāle
GE07bhg4c11u:831: ṛte 'pi tvā tvām arjunaṃ yoddhāraṃ vināpi tvad-vyāpāraṃ vināpi mad-vyāpāreṇaiva na bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti sarve
GE07bhg4c11u:832: bhīṣma-droṇa-karṇa-prabhṛtayo yoddhum anarhatvena sambhāvitā anye 'pi ye
GE07bhg4c11u:833: 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu pratipakṣa-sainyeṣu yodhā yodhāraḥ sarve 'pi mayā hatatvād eva na bhaviṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:836: baladevaḥ : evam arthito bhagavān uvāca kālo 'smīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:838: yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca ubhe bhavata odanaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:839: mṛtyur yasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra saḥ || [KaṭhU 1.2.25]
GE07bhg4c11u:840: iti śrutyā yaḥ kīrtyate sa kālo 'ham ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:841: iha samaye lokān duryodhanādīn samāhartuṃ grasituṃ pravṛttaṃ māṃ mat-pravṛtti-phalaṃ ca jānīhi
GE07bhg4c11u:842: tvām api yudhiṣṭhirādīṃś ca ṛte sarve na bhaviṣyanti na jīviṣyanti |
GE07bhg4c11u:843: yad vā, nanu raṇān nivṛtte mayi teṣāṃ kathaṃ kṣayaḥ syād iti
GE07bhg4c11u:845: tvāṃ yodhāram ṛte tvad-yuddha-vyāpāraṃ vināpi sarve na bhaviṣyanti mariṣyanty eva kālātmanā mayā teṣāṃ āyur-haraṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:846: ke te sarve ity āha pratyanīkeṣu paramparayor ye bhīṣmādayo 'vasthitāḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:847: yuddhān nivṛttasya tava tu svadharma-cyutir eva bhaved iti ||32||
GE07bhg4c11u:849: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham |
GE07bhg4c11u:854: devair api durjayā bhīṣmādayo 'rjunena nirjitā ity evaṃ bhūtaṃ yaśo labhasva

GE07bhg4c11u:921: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sandhiṃ kuryāt tadā śāntir ubhayeṣāṃ bhaved ity abhiprāyavāṃs tataḥ kiṃ vṛttam ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃjaya uvāca etad iti |

GE07bhg4c11u:944: etat tu sthāne yuktam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:945: tathā jagad anurajyate cānurāgam upaitīti yat |

GE07bhg4c11u:952: sthāna ity avyayaṃ yuktam ity arthe |
GE07bhg4c11u:953: he hṛṣīkeśa ! sarvendriya-pravartaka yatas tvam evam
GE07bhg4c11u:954_0: atyantādbhuta-prabhāvo bhakta-vatsalaś ca tatas tava prakīrtyā prakṛṣṭayā kīrtyā

GE07bhg4c11u:968: dravanti diśaḥ prati palāyanta ity etad api sthāne yuktam eva |

GE07bhg4c11u:986_1: sanakādayo namasyanti jaya jaya bhagavān ity udīrayantaḥ praṇamanti ca yuktaṃ tava

GE07bhg4c11u:990: he mahātman ! he ananta ! he deveśa ! he jagannivāsa ! kasmād dhetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskāraṃ kuryuḥ ? kathambhūtāya brahmaṇo 'py garīyase gurutarāya |
GE07bhg4c11u:993: tābhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma |

GE07bhg4c11u:996: madhusūdanaḥ : bhagavato harṣādi-viṣayatve hetum āha kasmāc ceti |
GE07bhg4c11u:997: kasmāc ca hetos te tubhyaṃ na nameran na namaskuryuḥ siddha-saṅghāḥ sarve 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:998: he mahātman paramodāra-citta ! he 'nanta sarva-pariccheda-śūnya ! he deveśa hiraṇyagarbhādīnām api devānāṃ niyantaḥ ! he jagan-nivāsa
GE07bhg4c11u:999: sarvāśraya ! tubhyaṃ kīdṛśāya brahmaṇo 'pi garīyase gurutarāyādi-kartre
GE07bhg4c11u:1001: niyantṛtvam upadeṣṭṛtvaṃ janakatvam ity ādir ekaiko 'pi hetur namaskāryatā-prayojakaḥ kiṃ punar mahātmatvānantatva-jagan-nivāsatvādi-nānā-kalyāṇa-guṇa-samuccita ity
GE07bhg4c11u:1002: anāścaryatā-sūcanārthaṃ namaskārasya kasmāc ceti vā-śabdārthaś ca-kāraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1003: kiṃ ca sat ? vidhi-mukhena pratīyamānam astīit |
GE07bhg4c11u:1008: tat-paraṃ tābhyāṃ sad-asadbhyāṃ paraṃ mūla-kāraṇaṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tad api tvam eva tvad-bhinnaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1011: etair hetubhis tvāṃ sarve namasyantīti na kim api citram ity arthaḥ ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:1012: viśvanāthaḥ : te kasmān na nameran, api tu namerann eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:1014: sat-kāryam asat-kāraṇaṃ ca tābhyāṃ paraṃ yad akṣaraṃ brahma tat tvam ||37||
GE07bhg4c11u:1015: baladevaḥ : atha bhagavataḥ sarva-namasyatvam abhidadhat sarva-vyāpitvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1018: ! he ananta sarva-vyāpin ! he deveśa sarva-deva-niyantaḥ ! he jagannivāsa sarvāśraya ! te siddha-saṅghās te tubhyaṃ kasmād dhetor na nameran ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1022: brahmaṇo 'py garīyase gurutarāya yasmād ādi-kartre tattva-sṛṣṭi-karāyeti
GE07bhg4c11u:1027: jīvātma-tattvāt prakṛti-tattvāc cokta-rūpāt param utkṛṣṭaṃ bhinnaṃ ca

GE07bhg4c11u:1030: tvam ādi-devaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1031: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma tvayā tataṃ viśvam ananta-rūpa ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:1032: śrīdharaḥ : kiṃ ca tvam ādi-deva iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1035: ataeva tvam asya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānam
GE07bhg4c11u:1037: yac ca vedyaṃ vastu-jātaṃ paraṃ ca dhāma
GE07bhg4c11u:1038: vaiṣṇavaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1039: ataeva he ananta-rūpa tvayaivedaṃ viśvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam |

GE07bhg4c11u:1041: madhusūdanaḥ : bhakty-udrekāt punar api stauti tvam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1046: tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam laya-sthānatvān nidhīyate sarvam asminn iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1049: vyāvartayan nimittatām āha vettā veditā sarvasyāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1050: dvaitāpattiṃ vārayati yac ca vedyaṃ tad api tvam evāsi vedana-rūpe veditari
GE07bhg4c11u:1052: ataeva paraṃ ca dhāma yat sac-cid-ānanda-ghanam avidyā-tat-kārya-nirmuktaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ tad api tvam evāsi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1053: tvayā sad-rūpeṇa sphūraṇa-rūpeṇa ca kāraṇena tataṃ vyāptam idaṃ svataḥ-sattā-sphūrti-śūnyaṃ viśvam kāryaṃ māyika-sambandhenaiva sthiti-kāla he 'nantarūpāparicchinna-svarūpa ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:1054: viśvanāthaḥ : nidhānaṃ laya-sthānaṃ paraṃ dhāma guṇātītaṃ svarūpam ||38||
GE07bhg4c11u:1056: paraṃ nidhānam paramāśrayo nidhīyate 'smin iti nirukteḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1057: jagati yo vettā yac ca vedyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ tvam eva |
GE07bhg4c11u:1058: kuta evam iti cet tatrāha yat tvayā viśvam idaṃ tataṃ tad-vyāpitvād ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1059: yac ca paraṃ dhāma parama-vyomākhyaṃ prāpya-sthānam tad api tvam eva
GE07bhg4c11u:1062: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca |

GE07bhg4c11u:1065: śrīdharaḥ : itaś ca sarvais tvam eva namaskāryaḥ sarva-devātmakatvād iti stuvan svayam api namaskaroti vāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1072: bhūyo 'pi punar api sahasra-kṛtvo namo nama iti
GE07bhg4c11u:1073: madhusūdanaḥ : vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ sūryādīnām apy upalakṣaṇam etat |
GE07bhg4c11u:1075: prapitāmahaś pitāmahasya hiraṇya-garbhasyāpi pitā ca tvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1076: yasmād evaṃ sarva-devātmakatvāt tvam eva sarvair namaskāryo 'si tasmān mamāpi varākasya namo namo namas te tubhyam astu sahasrakṛtvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1078: 'pi punar api ca namo namas te |
GE07bhg4c11u:1082: baladevaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śabda-vācyas tvam ity āha vāyur iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1084: pitāmahas tvaṃ tat-pitṛtvāt prapitāmahas tvaṃ bhavasi kaṅkaṇādiṣu kanakasyeva cid-acic-chaktimatas tava kāraṇasya vāyv-ādiṣu vyāptes tat tat
GE07bhg4c11u:1085: sarva-rūpas tvam ataḥ sarva-namasyo 'sīti mayā tvaṃ namasyase ity āha namo
GE07bhg4c11u:1088: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
GE07bhg4c11u:1089: ananta-vīryāmita-vikramas tvaṃ sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:1091: punar api bahuśaḥ praṇamati nama iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1092: he sarva sarvātman sarvāsu dikṣu tubhyaṃ namo 'stu |
GE07bhg4c11u:1093: sarvātmakam upapādayann āha anantaṃ vīryaṃ sāmarthyaṃ yasya tathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1095: evaṃ bhūtas tvaṃ sarvaṃ viśvaṃ samyag antar bahiś ca samāpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1096: suvarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādi sva-kāryaṃ vyāpya vartase tataḥ sarva-svarūpo 'si ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:1097: madhusūdanaḥ : tubhyaṃ purastād agra-bhāge namo 'stu tubhyaṃ puro namaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1101: namo 'stu te tubhyaṃ sarvata eva sarvāsu dikṣu sthitāya he sarva ! vīryaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1103: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manya uttaikaṃ śikṣayādhikam ity ukter bhīma-duryodhanayor anyeṣu caikaikaṃ vyavasthitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1104: tvaṃ tu ananta-vīryaś cāmita-vikramaś ceti samastam ekaṃ padam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1106: sarvaṃ samastaṃ jagat samāpnoṣi samyag ekenaa sad-rūpeṇāpnoṣi sarvātmanā vyāpnoṣi tatas
GE07bhg4c11u:1107: tasmāt sarvo 'si tvad-atiriktaṃ kim api nāstīty arthaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:1108: viśvanāthaḥ : sarvaṃ sva-kāryaṃ jagad āpnoṣi vyāpnoṣi svarṇam iva kaṭaka-kuṇḍalādikam atas tvam eva sarvaḥ ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:1109: baladevaḥ : bhakty-atiśayena namaskāreṣv alaṃ bhāvam avidan bahukṛtvaḥ praṇamati namaḥ purastād iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1110: he sarva ! purastāt pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvataś ca sthitāya te namo namo 'stu |
GE07bhg4c11u:1114: ekaṃ vīryādhikaṃ manyataikaṃ śikṣayādhikam iti bhīma-duryodhanāv uddiśyokteḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1118: sa tvam eva jagat-sraṣṭā yataḥ sarva-gato bhavān || iti ||40||
GE07bhg4c11u:1120: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1121: ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi ||41||
GE07bhg4c11u:1126: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayati sakhetīti dvyābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1127: tvaṃ prākṛteḥ sakhety evaṃ matvā prasabhaṃ haṭhāt tiraskāreṇa yad uktaṃ tat kṣāmaye tvām ity uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1128: kiṃ tat ? he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhg4c11u:1131: prasabhoktau hetuḥ - tava mahimānaṃ idaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:1132: viśva-rūpam ajānatā ca mayā pramādāt praṇayena snehena yad uktam iti
GE07bhg4c11u:1134: he acyuta ! yac ca parihāsārthaṃ krīḍādiṣu tiraskṛto 'si
GE07bhg4c11u:1136: sakhīn vinā rahasi sthita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1138: tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1139: tat sarvam aparādha-jātaṃ tvām aprameyam acintya-prabhāvaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamāṃ kārayāmi
GE07bhg4c11u:1140: madhusūdanaḥ : yato 'haṃ tvan-māhātmyāparijñānād aparādhān ajasrām akārṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1141: tataḥ parama-kāruṇikaṃ tvāṃ praṇamyāparādha-kṣamāṃ kāryāmītyāha sakhetīti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1142: tvaṃ mama sakhā samāna-vayā iti matvā prasabhaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1143: svotkarṣa-khyāpana-rūpeṇābhibhavena yad uktaṃ mayā tavedaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1147: pramādāc citta-vikṣepāt praṇayena snehena vāpi kim uktam ity āha he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07bhg4c11u:1148: yac cāvahāsārtham parihāsārthaṃ vihāra-śayyāsana-bhojaneṣu vihāraḥ krīḍā vyāyāmo vā, śayyā tūlikādyāstaraṇa-viśeṣaḥ, āsanaṃ siṃhāsanādi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1149: bhojanaṃ bahūnāṃ paṅkāvaśanaṃ teṣu viṣaya-bhūteṣu asatkṛto 'si mayā paribhūto 'si
GE07bhg4c11u:1150: ekaḥ sakhīn vihāya rahasi sthito vā tvam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1151: athavā tat-samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ vā, he 'cyuta ! sarvadā nirvikāra ! tat sarvaṃ vacana-rūpam asat-karaṇa-rūpaṃ cāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣāmayāmi tvām
GE07bhg4c11u:1152: aprameyam acintya-prabhāveṇa nirvikāreṇa ca parama-kāruṇikena bhagavatā
GE07bhg4c11u:1154: viśvanāthaḥ : hanta hantaitādṛśa-mahā-mahaiśvaryamat tvayy ahaṃ kṛta-mahāparādha-puñjo 'smīty anutāpam āviṣkurvann āha sakhetīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1163: tad api tvayā saha mama yat sakhyaṃ tatra tava paitrika-prabhāvo na hetuḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1165: kintu tāvaka evety abhiprāyato yeat prasabhaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1166: sa-tiraskāram uktaṃ mayā tat kṣāmaye kṣamayāmīty uttareṇānvayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1168: viśva-rūpātmakaṃ svarūpam eva mahimānaṃ pramādād vā praṇayena snehena vā parihāsārthaṃ vihārādiṣv asatkṛto 'si tvaṃ satyavādī niṣkapaṭaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1171: athavā tat samakṣaṃ teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ samakṣaṃ purato 'si yadā sthitas tadā jātaṃ tat sarvam aparādha-sahasraṃ kṣāmaye |
GE07bhg4c11u:1173: baladevaḥ : evam arjunaḥ sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-sakhaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vilokya saṃstutya praṇamya ca sva-sakhyasyaiśvarya-jñāna-saṃmiśratvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1175_0: kṛṣṇo bhagavān me sakhā mitram iti matvā niścitya tavedaṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1175_1: mahimānam ajānatānanubhavatā mayā pramādād anavadhānataḥ praṇayena sakhya-premṇā
GE07bhg4c11u:1175_2: vā yat tvāṃ prati prasabhaṃ haṭhād uktam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1177: kiṃ tad iti cet tatrāha he kṛṣṇety ādi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1179: etāni trīṇi sambodhanāny anādara-garbhāṇi he kṛṣṇety atra
GE07bhg4c11u:1184: avahāsārthaṃ parihāsāyāsatkṛto 'si satya-vāk saralo niṣkapaṭas tvam ity evaṃ vyañjaka-śabdair avajñāto 'si |
GE07bhg4c11u:1185: ekaḥ sakhīn vinā vijane sthitas tat samakṣaṃ vā teṣāṃ parihasatāṃ sakhīnāṃ purato vā sthita ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1187: sarva-vacana-rūpam asatkāra-rūpaṃ vāparādha-jātaṃ kṣāmaye kṣamasva prabho
GE07bhg4c11u:1193: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān |
GE07bhg4c11u:1197: na vidyate pratimā upamā yasya so 'pratimaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1198: tathāvidhaḥ prabhāvo yasya tava he apratima-prabhāva
GE07bhg4c11u:1199: | tvam asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janako 'si |
GE07bhg4c11u:1200: ataeva pūjyaś ca guruś ca guror api garīyān gurutaraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1206: asya carācarasya lokasya pitā janakas tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1210: ataeva na tvat-samo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo loka-traye 'pi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1212: apratima-prabhāva ! yasya samo 'pi nāsti dvitīyasya parameśvarasyābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c11u:1213: tasyādhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt sarvathā na sambhāvyata evety arthaḥ ||43||
GE07bhg4c11u:1216: asya lokasya pitā pūjyo guruḥ śāstropadeṣṭā ca tvam asi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1217: ataḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair garīyān gurutaras tvam
GE07bhg4c11u:1218: | he 'pratima-prabhāva ! ato 'smin loka-traye nikhile 'pi jagati tvat-sama
GE07bhg4c11u:1220: dvitīyasya pareśasyābhāvād eva tvad-adhiko 'nyaḥ kutaḥ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c11u:1221: śrutiś caivam āha na tat-samaś cābhyadhikaś ca dṛśyate iti ||43||
GE07bhg4c11u:1223: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1224: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum ||44||
GE07bhg4c11u:1231: atas tvaṃ mahāparādhaṃ soḍhuṃ kṣantum arhati |
GE07bhg4c11u:1232: kasya kva iva ? putrasyāparādhaṃ kṛpayā pitā yathā sahate |
GE07bhg4c11u:1234: priyaś ca priyāyā aparādhaṃ tat-priyārthaṃ yathā sahate tadvat ||44||
GE07bhg4c11u:1236: tasmāt praṇamya namaskṛtya tvāṃ praṇidhāya prakarṣeṇa nīcair dhṛtvā kāyaṃ daṇḍavad bhūmau patitveti yāvat
GE07bhg4c11u:1237: | prasādaye tvām īśam īḍyam sarva-stutyam aham aparādhī |
GE07bhg4c11u:1239: piteva putrasyāparādhaṃ sakheva sakhyur aparādhaṃ priyaḥ priyāyāḥ pativratāyā aparādhaṃ mamāparādhaṃ tvaṃ soḍhum kṣantum arhasi ananya-śaraṇatvān mama |
GE07bhg4c11u:1241: viśvanāthaḥ : kāyaṃ praṇidhāya bhūmau daṇḍavan nipātya priyāyārhasīti
GE07bhg4c11u:1244: kāyaṃ bhūmau praṇidhāya praṇamyeti sāṣṭāṅgaṃ praṇatiṃ kṛtvā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1247: sakheva sakhyur iti tu tadā mahaiśvaryaṃ vīkṣya svasmin dāsatva-mananāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1250: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me |
GE07bhg4c11u:1251: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagan-nivāsa ||45||
GE07bhg4c11u:1252: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ kṣamāpayitvā prārthayate adṛṣṭa-pūrvam iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c11u:1253: he deva pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1254: tathā bhayena ca me manaḥ pravyathitaṃ pracalitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1255: tasmān mama vyathā-nivṛntaye tad eva rūpaṃ darśaya |
GE07bhg4c11u:1256: he devaśa he jagannivāsa prasanno bhava ||45||
GE07bhg4c11u:1257: madhusūdanaḥ : evam aparādha-kṣamāṃ prārthya punaḥ prāg-rūpa-darśanaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1260: adṛṣṭa-pūrvaṃ pūrvam adṛṣṭaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito hṛṣṭo 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1261: tad-vikṛta-rūpa-darśanajena bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ vyākulīkṛtaṃ mano me |
GE07bhg4c11u:1262: atas tad eva prācīnam eva mama prāṇāpekṣayāpi priyaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya he deva he deveśa he jagan-nivāsa prasīda prāg-rūpa-darśana-rūpaṃ prasādaṃ me kuru ||45||
GE07bhg4c11u:1263: viśvanāthaḥ : yadyapy adṛṣṭa-pūrvam idaṃ te viśva-rūpātmakaṃ vapur dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi tad apy asya ghoratvād bhayena manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1264: tasmāt tad eva mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ mat-prāṇa-koṭy-adhika-priyaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1265: mādhurya-pārāvāraṃ vasudeva-nandanākāraṃ me darśaya prasīdety alaṃ tavaitādṛśaiśvaryasya darśanāyeti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1266: deveśeti tvaṃ sarvedvānām īśvaraḥ sarva-jagan-nivāso bhavasy eveti mayā pratītam iti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1269: tatraiva sthitam api yogamāyācchāditatvād arjunena na dṛṣṭam iti gamyate
GE07bhg4c11u:1270: baladevaḥ : atha kiṃ vakṣi kiṃ cecchasīti cet tatrāha adṛṣṭeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1271: tvayi kṛṣṇe sattvena jñātam apīdam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāhaṃ harṣito 'smi
GE07bhg4c11u:1272: mat-sakhasyedam asādhāraṇaṃ rūpam iti mudito 'smi manaś ca mama
GE07bhg4c11u:1274: ata idaṃ prārthayed evety ādi sarva-deva-niyantā tat-sarvādhāraḥ pareśas tvam asīti
GE07bhg4c11u:1275: mayā pratyakṣīkṛtam ataḥparaṃ tad-antarbhāvya tad eva mad-abhīṣṭaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1282: śrīdharaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ viśeṣayann āha kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1283: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1289: tad anena śrī-kṛṣṇam arjunaḥ pūrvam api kirīṭādi-yuktam eva paśyatīti gamyate
GE07bhg4c11u:1290: | yat tu pūrvam uktaṃ viśva-rūpa-darśane kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1292: yad vā etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca suprasannam apaśyaṃ tam evedānīṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1293: tejo-rāśiṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ paśyāmībhy evam atra vacanasya vyaktir ity avirodhaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c11u:1294: madhusūdanaḥ : tad eva rūpaṃ vivṛṇoti kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1295: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ tathaiva pūrvavad eva atas tenaiva rūpeṇa catur-bhujena vasudevātmajatvena bhava he idānīṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1299: etena sarvadā caturbhujādi-rūpam arjunena bhagavato dṛśyata ity uktam ||46||
GE07bhg4c11u:1301: kirīṭavantam gadāvantaṃ cakra-hastaṃ ca tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1304: he viśva-mūrte ! idaṃ viśva-rūpam upasaṃhṛtya tenaiva kirīṭādi-yuktena caturbhujena bhavāvirbhava
GE07bhg4c11u:1306: arjunaḥ pūrvam api kirīṭādi-yuktam eva paśyatīti gamyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:1307: yat tu pūrvam uktaṃ viśva-rūpa-darśane kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmīti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1309: yad vā etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca suprasannam apaśyaṃ tam evedānīṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1310: durnirīkṣyaṃ paśyāmībhy evam atra vacanasya vyaktir ity avirodhaḥ ||46||
GE07bhg4c11u:1311: baladevaḥ : tat kīdṛg ity āha kirīṭinam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1313: he viśva-mūrte ! idaṃ rūpam antarbhāvya divyābhinetṛ-naṭavat tenaiva caturbhujena rūpeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ san prādurbhava ||46||
GE07bhg4c11u:1315: śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātma-yogāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1316: tejo-mayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ yan me tvad-anyena na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam ||47||
GE07bhg4c11u:1317: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitas tam āśvāsayan bhagavān uvāca mayeti tribhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1318: he arjuna kim iti tvaṃ bibheṣi ? yato mayā prasannena kṛpayā tavedaṃ param
GE07bhg4c11u:1325: tvad-anyena tvādṛśād bhaktād anyena pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tat ||47||
GE07bhg4c11u:1326: madhusūdanaḥ : evam arjunena prasādito bhaya-vādhitam arjunam upalabhyopasaṃhṛtya viśva-rūpam ucitena vacanena tam āśvāsayan
GE07bhg4c11u:1329: yato mayā prasannena tvad-viṣaya-kṛpātiśayavatedaṃ viśva-rūpātmakaṃ paraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ rūpaṃ tava darśitam ātma-yogād asādhāraṇān nija-sāmarthyāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1330: paratvaṃ vivṛṇoti tejo-mayaṃ tejaḥ-pracuraṃ viśvam samastam anantam ādyaṃ ca yan
GE07bhg4c11u:1331: mama rūpaṃ tvad-anyena kenāpi na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭam ||47||
GE07bhg4c11u:1332: viśvanāthaḥ : bho arjuna ! draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07bhg4c11u:1333: iti tvat-prārthanayaivedaṃ mayā mad-aṃśasya viśva-rūpa-puruṣasya rūpaṃ darśitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1334: katham atra te manaḥ pravyathitam abhūt ? yataḥ prasīda prasīdety uktyā tan-mānuṣam eva rūpaṃ me didṛkṣase, tasmāt kim idam
GE07bhg4c11u:1336: prasannenaiva mayā tava tubhyam evedaṃ rūpaṃ darśitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1337: nānyasmai, yatas tvatto 'nyena kenāpi etan na pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1338: tad api tvam etan na spṛhayasi kim iti bhāvaḥ ||47||
GE07bhg4c11u:1339: baladevaḥ : evaṃ prārthito bhagavān uvāca mayeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1340: he arjuna ! draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam ity ādi tvat-prārthitaṃ prasannena mayedaṃ tejo-mayaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1341: paramaiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ vaidūryavad abhinetṛ-naṭavac ca tvad-abhīṣṭe kṛṣṇe mayi sthitam eva tava darśitam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1343: rūpaṃ tvad-anyena janena pūrvaṃ na dṛṣṭam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1345: api devādibhir dṛṣṭaṃ bhakti-dṛśyaṃ mama tat-svarūpaṃ bhaktaṃ tvāṃ prati
GE07bhg4c11u:1348: yat tu gaja-sāhvaye duryodhanādibhir api viśvarūpaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tan nedṛgvidham iti tvad-anyena na dṛṣṭa-pūrvam ity uktam ||47||
GE07bhg4c11u:1350: na veda-yajñādhyayanair na dānair na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1353: śrīdharaḥ : etad-darśanam atidurlabhaṃ labdhvā tvaṃ kṛtārtho 'sīty āha na vedeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1363: api tu tvam eva kevalaṃ mat-prasādena dṛṣṭvā kṛtārtho 'si ||48||
GE07bhg4c11u:1364: madhusūdanaḥ : etad-rūpa-darśanātmakam atidurlabhaṃ mat-prasādaṃ labdhvā kṛtārtha evāsi tvam ity āha na vedeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1373: kāyendriya-śoṣakatvena duṣkarair evaṃ-rūpo 'haṃ na śakyo nṛ-loke
GE07bhg4c11u:1374: manuṣya-loke draṣṭuṃ tvad-anyena mad-anugraha-hīnena he kuru-pravīra !
GE07bhg4c11u:1378: na ca kriyābhir ity atra ca-kārād
GE07bhg4c11u:1380: viśvanāthaḥ : tubhyaṃ darśitam idaṃ rūpaṃ tu vedādi-sādhanair api durlabham ity āha na vedeti
GE07bhg4c11u:1381: tvatto 'nyena na kenāpy aham evaṃrūpo draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1385: alabhya-lābham ātmano matvā tvam asminn eveśvare, sarva-durlabhe rūpe
GE07bhg4c11u:1387: etad-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāpy alaṃ te punar me mānuṣa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c11u:1389: baladevaḥ : atha sahasra-śīrṣādi-lakṣaṇasyaiśvara-rūpasya pumarthatām āha na vedeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1394: ebhiḥ kevalair vedādhyayanādibhir bhakti-yuktāt tvatto 'nyena bhakti-riktena kenāpi puṃsā evaṃ-rūpo 'haṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakyo, bhaktiṃ vinā bhūtāni vedādhyayanādīni
GE07bhg4c11u:1398: mad-bhaktyāpetam ātmānaṃ na samyak prapunāti hi || iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1399: tvayā tu bhaktimatā dṛṣṭa evāham anyaiś ca bhaktimadbhir devādibhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1403: nṛ-loke ity uktes tal-loke tad-bhaktā devā bahavas tad
GE07bhg4c11u:1406: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍha-bhāvo
GE07bhg4c11u:1408: vyapeta-bhīḥ prīta-manāḥ punas tvaṃ tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya ||49||
GE07bhg4c11u:1409: śrīdharaḥ : evam api cet tavedaṃ ghoraṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vyathā bhavati tarhi tad eva rūpaṃ darśayāmīty āha mā ta iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1410: īdṛg īdṛśaṃ ghoraṃ madīyaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā te ā te vyathā māstu |
GE07bhg4c11u:1412: vigata-bhayaḥ prīta-manāś ca san punas tvaṃ tad evedaṃ mama rūpaṃ prakarṣeṇa paśya ||49||
GE07bhg4c11u:1413: madhusūdanaḥ : evaṃ ghoram īdṛg aneka-bāhv-ādi-yuktatvena bhayaṅkaraṃ mama rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthitasya te tava yā vyathā bhaya-nimittā pīḍā sā mā bhūt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1414: tathā mad-rūpa-darśane 'pi yo vimūḍha-bhāvo vyākula-cittatvam aparitoṣaḥ so 'pi mā bhūt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1415_0: kintu vyapeta-bhīr apagata-bhayaḥ prīta-manāś ca san punas tvaṃ tad eva caturbhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1415_1: vāsudevatvādi-viśiṣṭaṃ tvayā sadā pūrva-dṛṣṭaṃ rūpam idaṃ viśva-rūpopasaṃhāreṇa prakaṭīkriyamāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1415_2: prapaśya prakarṣeṇa bhaya-rāhityena santoṣeṇa ca paśya ||49 ||
GE07bhg4c11u:1416: viśvanāthaḥ : bhoḥ parameśvara ! māṃ tvaṃ kiṃ na gṛhṇāsi ? yad anicchate 'pi mahyaṃ punar idam eva balād ditsasi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1417: dṛṣṭvedaṃ tavaiśvaryaṃ mama gātrāṇi vyathante, mano me vyākulībhavati |
GE07bhg4c11u:1419: tavāsmai paramaiśvaryāya dūrata eva mama namo namo 'stu, na kadāpy ahaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1423: apūrva-mādhurya-dhurya-smita-hasita-sudhā-sāra-varṣi-mukha-candraṃ me darśaya darśayeti vyākulam arjunaṃ prati sāśvāsam āha mā te iti ||49||
GE07bhg4c11u:1424_0: baladevaḥ : yac ca tasminn eva mad-rūpe saṃhartṛtvaṃ mayā pradarśitaṃ tat khalu drapadī-pragharṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1424_1: vīkṣyāpi tuṣṇīṃ sthitā bhīṣmādayaḥ sarve tat-pragharṣaṇa-kupitena mayaiva nihantavyā
GE07bhg4c11u:1425: taveti bodhayitum atas tena tvaṃ vyathito mābhūr ity āha mā te vyatheti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1428: saṃjaya uvāca ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1429: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā ||50||
GE07bhg4c11u:1430: śrīdharaḥ : evam uktvā prāktanam eva rūpaṃ mat-sakhaṃ prasannaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana idānīm adhunāsmi saṃvṛttaḥ saṃjātaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1434: madhusūdanaḥ : vāsudevo 'rjunam iti prāg-uktam uktvā yathā pūrvam āsīt tathā svakaṃ rūpaṃ kirīṭa-makara-kuṇḍala-gadā-cakrādi-yuktaṃ caturbhujaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1436: āśvāsayāmāsa ca bhītam enam arjunaṃ bhūtvā punaḥ pūrvavat saumya-vapur
GE07bhg4c11u:1437: anugra-śarīro mahātmā parama-kāruṇikaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvajña ity
GE07bhg4c11u:1443: tataḥ punaḥ sa mahātmā somya-vapuḥ kaṭaka-kuṇḍaloṣṇīṣa-pītāmbara-dharo dvibhujo bhūtvā bhītam enam āśvāsayāmāsa ||50||
GE07bhg4c11u:1444: baladevaḥ : tato yad abhūt tat saṃjaya uvāca ity arjunam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1446: 'rjunaṃ prati pūrvoktam uktvā yathā saṅkalpenaiva sahasra-śiraskaṃ rūpaṃ darśitavān tathaiva svakaṃ nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-guṇakaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1447: devakī-putra-lakṣaṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ rūpaṃ darśayāmāsa evaṃ saumya-vapuḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1448: sundara-vigraho bhūtvā bhītam enam arjunaṃ punar āśvāsayāmāsa |
GE07bhg4c11u:1452: arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana |
GE07bhg4c11u:1453: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ ||51||
GE07bhg4c11u:1454: śrīdharaḥ : tato nirbhayaḥ sann arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1461: madhusūdanaḥ : tato nirbhayaḥ san arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1462: idānīṃ sacetā bhaya-kṛta-vyāmohābhāvenāvyākula-cittaḥ saṃvṛtto 'smi tathā prakṛtiṃ bhaya-kṛta-vyathā-rāhityena svāsthyaṃ gato 'smi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1465: ālokyānanda-sindhu-snātaḥ sann āha idānīm evāhaṃ sa-cetāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1466: sa-ceto abhuvaṃ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ svāsthyaṃ prāpto 'smi ||51||
GE07bhg4c11u:1467: baladevaḥ : tato nirvyathaḥ prasanna-manāḥ sann arjuna uvāca dṛṣṭvedam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1468: he janārdana tavedaṃ saumyaṃ manojñaṃ caturbhujaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvāham idānīṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1469: sa-cetāḥ prasanna-cittaḥ prakṛtiṃ vyathādy-abhāvena svāsthyaṃ ca gataḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1471: kīdṛśaṃ rūpam ity āha mānuṣam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1474: pāṇḍaveṣu dvibhujaḥ kadācic caturbhujaś ca krīḍati |
GE07bhg4c11u:1480: śrī-bhagavān uvāca sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama |
GE07bhg4c11u:1481: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśana-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c11u:1482: śrīdharaḥ : svakṛtasyānugrahasyātidurlabhatvaṃ darśayana bhagavān uvāca sudurdarśam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1483: yan mama viśva-rūpaṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1485: yato devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ sarvadā darśanam icchanti kevalam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1489: mama yad rūpam idānīṃ tvaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi,
GE07bhg4c11u:1490: idaṃ viśva-rūpaṃ sudurdarśam atyantaṃ draṣṭum aśakyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1491: yato devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ sarvadā darśana-kāṅkṣiṇo na tu tvam iva pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭavanto
GE07bhg4c11u:1494: viśvanāthaḥ : darśitasya svarūpasya māhātmyam āha sudurdarśam iti tribhiḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1495: | devatā api asya darśanākāṅkṣiṇa eva na tu darśanaṃ labhante |
GE07bhg4c11u:1497: man-mūla-svarūpa-narākāra-mahā-mādhurya-nityāsvādine tvac-cakṣuse katham etad coratām ? ataeva mayā divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ iti divyaṃ cakṣur
GE07bhg4c11u:1499: kintu divya-cakṣur iva divyaṃ mano na dattam ataeva
GE07bhg4c11u:1503: tubhyam adāsyaṃ tadā deva-loka iva bhavān apy etad viśvarūpa pūruṣa-svarūpam arocayiṣyad eveti bhāvaḥ ||52||
GE07bhg4c11u:1504: baladevaḥ : mayā pradarśitaṃ na veda-yajñādhyayaniḥ ity ādinā ślāghitaṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:1506: manuṣya-bhāva-bhāvite śrī-kṛṣṇe mayi kadācid viślatha-bhāvo mābhūd iti bhāvena svaka-rūpasya parama-puruṣārthatām upadiśati sudurdarśam iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1511: yat tvaṃ sucirād dṛṣṭavān asi katham evaṃ praty emīti cet tatrāha devā apy asyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1512: etac ca daśamādau garbha-stuty-ādinā prasiddham eva ||52||
GE07bhg4c11u:1514: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1515: śakya evaṃ-vidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1516: śrīdharaḥ : atra hetum āha nāham iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1518: madhusūdanaḥ : kasmād devā etad-rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭavanto na vā drakṣyanti mad-bhakti-śūnyatvād ity āha nāham iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1519: na veda-yajñādhyayanair ity ādinā gatārthaḥ ślokaḥ parama-durlabhatva-khyāpanāyābhyastaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1520: viśvanāthaḥ : kiṃ ca yuṣmad-aspṛhaṇīyam apy etat svarūpam anye
GE07bhg4c11u:1521: puruṣārtha-sāratvena ye spṛhayanti, tair vedādhyayanādibhir api sādhanair etaj jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ cāśakyam eveti pratīhīty āha nāham iti ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1524: caturbhujas tvat-sakho 'haṃ vedādibhir api sādhanaiḥ kenāpi puṃsā bhakti-śūnyena draṣṭuṃ na śakyo yathā tvaṃ māṃ dṛṣṭavān asi ||53||
GE07bhg4c11u:1526: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃ-vidho 'rjuna |
GE07bhg4c11u:1527: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa ||54||
GE07bhg4c11u:1528: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi kenopāyena tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ śakya iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1530: ananyayā mad-eka-niṣṭhayā bhaktyā tv evambhūto viśvarūpo 'haṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1531: tattvena paramārthato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ śāstrataḥ draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣataḥ praveṣṭuṃ ca tādātmyena śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1533: madhusūdanaḥ : yadi veda-tapo-dānejyābhir draṣṭum aśakyas tvaṃ tarhi kenopāyena draṣṭuṃ śakyo 'sīty ata āha bhaktyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1536_1: bhaktyā kintu tattvena draṣṭuṃ ca svarūpeṇa sākṣātkartuṃ ca śakyo vedānta-vākya-śravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsana-paripākeṇa
GE07bhg4c11u:1536_2: tataś ca svarūpa-sākṣātkārād avidyā-tat-kārya-nivṛttau tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca
GE07bhg4c11u:1540: viśvanāthaḥ : tarhi kena sādhanenaivaṃ prāpyata ity ata āha bhaktyā tv iti
GE07bhg4c11u:1544: tadā tattvena brahma-svarūpatvena praveṣṭum apy ananyayā bhaktyaiva śakyo nānyathā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1546: jñāna-saṃnyāsānāntaram urvaritāllīyasy ananyaiva bhavet tayaiva teṣāṃ sāyujyaṃ bhaved iti tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram ity atra pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ ||54||
GE07bhg4c11u:1547: baladevaḥ : abhimatāṃ para-bhaktaika-dṛśyatāṃ sphuṭayann āha bhaktyeti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1548: evaṃvidho devakī-sūnuś caturbhujo 'ham ananyayā mad-ekāntayā bhaktyā tu vedādibhis tattvato jñātuṃ śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1549: draṣṭuṃ pratyakṣaṃ kartuṃ tattvataḥ praveṣṭuṃ saṃyoktuṃ ca śakyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1550: puraṃ praviśatīty atra pura-saṃyoga eva pratīyate |
GE07bhg4c11u:1557: śrutiś caivam āha yasya deve parā bhaktiḥ ity ādyā |
GE07bhg4c11u:1566: nāhaṃ vedaiḥ ity ādeḥ paunarukty-āpatteś ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1567: yat tu divya-dṛṣṭi-dānena liṅgena narākārāc caturbhujāt sahasra-śīrṣṇo
GE07bhg4c11u:1568: devākārasyotkarṣam āha tad-avicāritābhidhānam eva devākārasya tasya
GE07bhg4c11u:1570: tattvaṃ ca tasya yuktam eva yaḥ
GE07bhg4c11u:1571: kāraṇārṇava-jale bhajati sma yoga-nidrām iti smaraṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1573: narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ saccidānandaṃ sarva-vedānta-vedyaṃ vibhuṃ sarvāvatārīti pratyetavyaṃ
GE07bhg4c11u:1578: eko 'pi san bahudhā yo 'vabhāti [GTU 1.19] ity ādi śravaṇāt |
GE07bhg4c11u:1582: ete cāṃśa-kalāḥ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṇas tu bhagavān svayaṃ ity ādi smaraṇāc ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1583: atrāpi svayam evoktaṃ mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat iti, aham ādir hi devānāṃ ity ādi ca |
GE07bhg4c11u:1584: arjunena ca - paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c11u:1585_0: tasmād atiprabhāveṇa saṃkrānte sahasra-śīrṣṇi rūpe tena saṃkrāntaiva dṛṣṭir grāhiṇī
GE07bhg4c11u:1586: tādṛg-rūpa-grāhi tejastvam eva saṃkramitam iti mantavyam |
GE07bhg4c11u:1587: na tu yuktyābhāsa-lābhena haitukatvaṃ svīkāryam, na cārjuno 'py anya-manuṣyavac
GE07bhg4c11u:1590: | karmodbhūtayā vidyayā sa-niṣṭhaiḥ sahasra-śiraskaṃ rūpaṃ labhyam iti
GE07bhg4c11u:1591: durdarśaṃ tat narākṛti-kṛṣṇa-rūpaṃ tv ananyayā bhaktyaiveti sudurdarśaṃ tad uktam ||54||
GE07bhg4c11u:1594: nirvairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava ||55||
GE07bhg4c11u:1595: śrīdharaḥ : ataḥ sarva-śāstra-sāraṃ paramaṃ rahasyaṃ śṛṇv ity āha mat-karma-kṛd iti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1597: aham eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1602: evaṃ bhūto yaḥ sa māṃ prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c11u:1612: svargādi-kāmanāyāṃ satyāṃ katham evam iti nety āha mat-paramaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1613: aham eva paramaḥ prāptavyatvena niścito na tu svargādir yasya saḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1614: ataeva mat-prāpty-āśayā mad-bhaktaḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair mama bhajana-paraḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1615: putrādiṣu snehe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha saṅga-varjitaḥ |
GE07bhg4c11u:1617: śatruṣu dveṣe sati katham evaṃ syād iti nety āha nivairaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu |
GE07bhg4c11u:1618: apakāriṣv api dveṣa-śūnyo yaḥ sa mām ety abhedena |
GE07bhg4c11u:1620: jñātum iṣṭo mayopadiṣṭo nātaḥ paraṃ kiṃcit kartavyam astīty arthaḥ ||55||
GE07bhg4c11u:1623: viśvanāthaḥ : atha bhakti-prakaraṇopasaṃhārārthaṃ saptamādhyāyādiṣu ye ye
GE07bhg4c11u:1624: bhaktā uktās teṣāṃ sāmānya-lakṣaṇam āha mat-karma-kṛd iti |
